review: The speed and design of the platform is incredible.  Performance seems to be much better than what I've experienced using Apple TV.  However, if you have Comcast Xfinity, this is likely not the best option for you as HBO Go and Showtime Anytime are not available options.  I purchased for a bedroom TV to play Hulu Plus, Nexflix, HBO, and Showtime and was disappointed that the latter two options aren't available.  Will keep considering the price is low and hoping that they might be added as an option sometime in the future.

review: I can't imagine why I waited so long to buy the Fire TV Stick. I absolutely love it. It is easy to install and use. I am enjoying the movies and especially the documentary series. My grandkids love the kids and family selections. My granddaughter who just turned three uses the remote to choose her favorite Kipper and Barney programs. I can't stop recommending it to family and friends. This is an amazing device.
